&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#160; 2.02 Results from Operations and Financial Condition . &#160; Item&#160;7.01 Regulation FD Disclosure. &#160; On October 2, 2020, Tesla, Inc. published the press release which is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and is incorporated herein by reference. &#160; This information is intended to be furnished under Items 2.02 and 7.01 of Form 8-K and shall not be deemed &#8220;filed&#8221; for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#8220; Exchange Act &#8221;), or incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing. &#160;
